headline: Has The Market Overreacted To AvalonBay Communities (AVB) Share Price Weakness?
summary: If you are wondering whether AvalonBay Communities at around US$173 per share is offering fair value or a potential bargain, looking closely at its current valuation can help you frame that decision more clearly. The stock is down about 1.1% over the last week, 3.3% over the last month, 3.9% year to date, and 18.0% over the past year, while its 3 year and 5 year returns sit at 6.4% and 14.3% respectively. Recent price moves sit against a backdrop of ongoing interest in U.S. residential...
